newsitem.title: USA: PowerCerv says holder suit without merit.
newsitem.headline: PowerCerv says holder suit without merit.

text.p: PowerCerv Corp said it has become aware of a class action suit filed against it on behalf of purchasers of company common stock between March 1 and July 24, 1996, and believes the suit to be without merit.
The company issued a news release saying it had not yet been served with legal papers, but based its opinion of the suit on information contained in a news release issued by plaintiffs lawyers.
The suit was filed in U.S. District Court for the Middle District of Florida, PowerCerv said.
PowerCerv said it intends to fight the action.
PowerCerv did not describe the allegations contained in the suit and a company spokesperson could not immediately be reached for comment.
